author: Betsy Woodruff Swan
title: Coronavirus outbreak is reshaping terrorist plots, DOJ says
description: John Demers, the head of the Justice Department's National Security Division, said the pandemic may prompt some terrorists to speed up their attack plans.
content: The same way it impacts all of our lives, it does impact some of the planning that were seeing people doing and the way theyre thinking about it, Demers said. Sometimes in conflicting ways: Some people are putting off plans, and other people are saying, Well … [+1524 chars]
